SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

swirl.workspace
Interface HostPathCodec

All Known Implementing Classes:
HostPathCodecImpl, LookupCodec, QuerystringCodec
public interface HostPathCodec

DOCUMENT ME!

Author:
bpillet

Method Summary
 String decodeHost()
          assuming the implementation of this codec has access to the client's request or the requested href, this method will figure out which peer was encoded in the href/request
 String decodePath()
          assuming the implementation of this codec has access to the client's request or the requested href, this method will figure out the path on the peer to proxy to, often replacing "/swirl" with "/slide"
 String encodeHostInPath(String href, String encodeHost)
          Mangle the href and/or the request in a response to the client so that when the client accesses the href again, the proxy will know which peer to proxy to
 

Method Detail

decodeHost

public String decodeHost()
assuming the implementation of this codec has access to the client's request or the requested href, this method will figure out which peer was encoded in the href/request

Returns:
the peer to proxy to

decodePath

public String decodePath()
assuming the implementation of this codec has access to the client's request or the requested href, this method will figure out the path on the peer to proxy to, often replacing "/swirl" with "/slide"

Returns:
the peer to proxy to

encodeHostInPath

public String encodeHostInPath(String href,
                               String encodeHost)
Mangle the href and/or the request in a response to the client so that when the client accesses the href again, the proxy will know which peer to proxy to

Parameters:
href - the href to mangle
encodeHost - the peer it belongs to
Returns:
the new href
